entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon with 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 15.
